snippet: The office of a federal prosecutor, Preet Bharara, said it was looking into whether the New York State district had discriminated against students.
abstract: United States attorney's office for Southern District of New York opens civil rights investigation into allegations of anti-Semitic harassment of children in Pine Bush Central School District; office of federal prosecutor Preet Bhara is looking into whether school system, its Board of Education, or employees and agents have discriminated against students by deliberate indifference allowing harassment to occur with little intervention.
lead_paragraph: The office of a federal prosecutor, Preet Bharara, said it was looking into whether the New York State district had discriminated against students.

headline.main: U.S. Investigates Anti-Semitism Claims at Pine Bush Schools
headline.print_headline: U.S. Investigates Claims of Anti-Semitic Harassment at Upstate School System
